channel.title: Nudity on Space·Time Will Tell
channel.description: Recent content in Nudity on Space·Time Will Tell

item.title: Space·Time Deck: The Rock Suit
item.description: After the Paper Suit, here comes the Rock Suit. Warning Some nudity. Rock traditionally symbolizes: - stability; - reliability; - power. The cards: - Ruler - Dragon - Treasure - Soldier - Builder - Seeker - Lover - Servant - Home - Foot (blank, customizable) - Teddy bear (blank, customizable) Note that the blue borders are not part of the cards. They are just there to delimit the safe-to-draw zone.
